title: List of all Android pdf viewer  lightweight libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android pdf viewer  lightweight libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: Pdf-Viewer
repoList.description: A Lightweight PDF Viewer Android library which only occupies around 125kb while most of the Pdf viewer occupies up to 16MB space.

repoList.name: PDF
repoList.description: A lightweight PDF viewer which uses Android PdfRenderer library
